zh-Hant.title: 代碼釋義器
zh-Hant.prompt: I would like you to serve as a code interpreter, elucidate the syntax and the semantics of the code line-by-line. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Chinese.
zh-Hant.description: 我希望你能充當代碼解釋者，闡明代碼的語法和語義。
zh-Hant.remark: 讓 AI 解釋每步代碼的作用。來自 @Tractor1928 的投稿，後由 @yiqiongwu 修改。

metaDescription: 代碼困惑？獲取逐行語法與語義解析。無需運行，清晰理解邏輯與功能！立即嘗試！
